issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Write arrow::Array directly into parquet::TypedColumnWriter<T>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6152](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6152). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
